result.eng: I am still healthy, thanks God.
result.ga: Buíochas le Dia tá mo shláinte fós agam
result.orig: Buíochas le Dia tá mo shláinte fós agam
result.html: Buíochas le Dia tá mo shláinte fós agamI am still healthy, thanks God.
result.ponchtml: Buíoċas le Dia tá mo ẛláinte fós agamI am still healthy, thanks God.

result.eng: The owner tendered thanks to his team and to the visitors.
result.ga: Ghabh an t-úinéir buíochas lena fhoireann féin agus leis na cuairteoirí
result.orig: Ghabh an t-úinéir buíochas lena fhoireann féin agus leis na cuairteoirí
result.html: Ghabh an t-úinéir buíochas lena fhoireann féin agus leis na cuairteoiríThe owner tendered thanks to his team and to the visitors.
result.ponchtml: Ġaḃ an t-úinéir buíoċas lena ḟoireann féin agus leis na cuairteoiríThe owner tendered thanks to his team and to the visitors.

result.html: Míle buíochasA million thanks!
result.ponchtml: Míle buíoċasA million thanks!

result.eng: No need to thank me, my friend.
result.ga: Níl aon bhuíochas ort a chara
result.orig: Níl aon bhuíochas ort a chara
result.html: Níl aon bhuíochas ort a charaNo need to thank me, my friend.
result.ponchtml: Níl aon ḃuíoċas ort a ċaraNo need to thank me, my friend.

result.eng: Here's a box of chocolates as a sign of thanks.
result.ga: Seo chugat bosca seacláide mar chomhartha buíochais
result.orig: Seo chugat bosca seacláide mar chomhartha buíochais
result.html: Seo chugat bosca seacláide mar chomhartha buíochaisHere's a box of chocolates as a sign of thanks.
result.ponchtml: Seo ċugat bosca seacláide mar ċoṁarṫa buíoċaisHere's a box of chocolates as a sign of thanks.

result.eng: The pub is still open, thanks God.
result.ga: Tá an pub fós ar oscailt buíochas le Dia
result.orig: Tá an pub fós ar oscailt buíochas le Dia
result.html: Tá an pub fós ar oscailt buíochas le DiaThe pub is still open, thanks God.
result.ponchtml: Tá an pub fós ar oscailt buíoċas le DiaThe pub is still open, thanks God.

result.html: Tá buíochas ag dul dóHe deserves thanks.
result.ponchtml: Tá buíoċas ag dul dóHe deserves thanks.

result.eng: I am well, thanks be to God.
result.ga: Tá mé go maith buíochas le Dia
result.orig: Tá mé go maith buíochas le Dia
result.html: Tá mé go maith buíochas le DiaI am well, thanks be to God.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé go maiṫ buíoċas le DiaI am well, thanks be to God.

result.eng: The ten of them are still alive, thank God.
result.ga: Tá an deichniúr acu fós beo buíochas le Dia
result.orig: Tá an deichniúr acu fós beo buíochas le Dia
result.html: Tá an deichniúr acu fós beo buíochas le DiaThe ten of them are still alive, thank God.
result.ponchtml: Tá an deiċniúr acu fós beo buíoċas le DiaThe ten of them are still alive, thank God.

result.eng: They thanked God for saving them from the danger.
result.ga: Ghabh siad buíochas le Dia as iad a thabhairt slán as an gcontúirt
result.orig: Ghabh siad buíochas le Dia as iad a thabhairt slán as an gcontúirt
result.html: Ghabh siad buíochas le Dia as iad a thabhairt slán as an gcontúirtThey thanked God for saving them from the danger.
result.ponchtml: Ġaḃ siad buíoċas le Dia as iad a ṫaḃairt slán as an gcontúirtThey thanked God for saving them from the danger.

result.eng: We live in a new world now, thanks to Bin Laden, Mohammed Atta and scores of others who are not there anymore to see it.
result.ga: Táimid inár gcónaí i ndomhan nua anois a bhuíochas do Bin Laden Mohammed Atta agus na scórtha eile nach bhfuil ann níos mó chun é a fheiceáil
result.orig: Táimid inár gcónaí i ndomhan nua anois a bhuíochas do Bin Laden Mohammed Atta agus na scórtha eile nach bhfuil ann níos mó chun é a fheiceáil
result.html: Táimid inár gcónaí i ndomhan nua anois a bhuíochas do Bin Laden Mohammed Atta agus na scórtha eile nach bhfuil ann níos mó chun é a fheiceáilWe live in a new world now, thanks to Bin Laden, Mohammed Atta and scores of others who are not there anymore to see it.
result.ponchtml: Táimid inár gcónaí i ndoṁan nua anois a ḃuíoċas do Bin Laden Mohammed Atta agus na scórṫa eile naċ ḃfuil ann níos mó ċun é a ḟeiceáilWe live in a new world now, thanks to Bin Laden, Mohammed Atta and scores of others who are not there anymore to see it.
